Package com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price

Class StandalonePriceDraftBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.commercetools.api.models.standalone_price.StandalonePriceDraftBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Builder<StandalonePriceDraft>
public class StandalonePriceDraftBuilder extends Object implements Builder<StandalonePriceDraft>
StandalonePriceDraftBuilder
Example to create an instance using the builder pattern 

     StandalonePriceDraft standalonePriceDraft = StandalonePriceDraft.builder()
             .sku("{sku}")
             .value(valueBuilder -> valueBuilder)
             .build()

    • validFrom

      public StandalonePriceDraftBuilder validFrom(@Nullable ZonedDateTime validFrom)

      Sets the date from which the Price is valid. Must be at least 1 ms earlier than validUntil.

      Parameters:
      validFrom - value to be set
      Returns:
      Builder

    • validUntil

      public StandalonePriceDraftBuilder validUntil(@Nullable ZonedDateTime validUntil)

      Sets the date until the Price is valid. Must be at least 1 ms later than validFrom. Standalone Prices that are no longer valid are not automatically deleted, but they can be deleted if necessary.

      Parameters:
      validUntil - value to be set
      Returns:
      Builder

    • tiers

      public StandalonePriceDraftBuilder tiers(@Nullable PriceTierDraft... tiers)

      Sets price tiers.

      If discounted is set, the tiered Price is ignored for a Product Variant.

      Parameters:
      tiers - value to be set
      Returns:
      Builder
